column5: Spent from 3-4:30 yesterday at the ice shack.we were hoping to go fish for lake trout but it has been very windy up here and i dont have a pop up shelter.But we are glad we went to the shack as it eems to have rebounded from the the slow fishing a week ago when rod and rob were there.we instantly had fish biting.They seemed to be all small males in 3-14" range which was fine for us.A straight hook and a 1/8 oz split shot 3 ft from the bait seemed to be the best presentation.it was 8 drops and 8 fish.lol.we fished a while longer till it slowed down and went home.great place to isolate ourselves.Hope everyone is doing well.iam sure if we all go by the rules this virus will dissapear
John those 3 inch walleyes make great appetizers lol,stay safe my friend your in a great place where you are away from the concrete jungle,takecare,rod
Will do Rod.trying to go for trout.its still very windy.hopefully tomorrow as it will be warming up also.
Ok guess i had typo error on the size.lol.just noticed.basicall all around 13-14.lol.
Well now I know a Ontario walleye can grow from 3 inches to 13 inches in hours lol,that's why I like fishing Ontario the fish can grow fast n big haha
Well I will be thinking about you pounding on the Lakers while I'm stuck in a town home,fry one up at home for me
